alert.note: Alert for Atchison (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 12 at 9:57PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Atchison County through 1030 PM CDT... At 956 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Peru, or 12 miles west of Tarkio, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tarkio, Rock Port, Watson and Phelps City. This includes Interstate 29 between mile markers 105 and 122. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for northwestern Missouri.
